quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare has shared information about Tuberculosis (TB) cases in India. What is the incidence of TB in India in the year 2021?
options: 256/lakh population
210/lakh population
190/lakh population
170/lakh population
216/lakh population

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the initiative TULIP?

A.     TULIP stands for The Urban Learning Internship Programme.

B.      It has been launched by the Ministry of Education.

C.      It was launched in 2020.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), SUVIDYA module has been launched by __________ to enhance ease of living for the citizens in cantonment areas.
options: Ministry of Education
Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
Ministry of Defence
Ministry of Home Affairs
1 and 2

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Education has shared the information regarding National Curriculum Framework for Foundational Stage in the Lok Sabha. It is the first ever integrated Curriculum Framework for children between ages ___________in India.
options: 4 to 8 years
5 to 10 years
3 to 5 years
4 to 6 years
3 to 8 years

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the 7th India Water Impact Summit (IWIS 2022) has been held in New Delhi. Which of the following is the theme of the summit?
options: River Resources allocation
Restoration and Conservation of Small Rivers in a Large Basin
Understanding the concept and nuances of Arth Ganga
Valuing Water - Transforming Ganga
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister for New & Renewable Energy has briefed about the skill development programmes offered by Ministry of New & Renewable Energy (MNRE). Which of the following programmes is/are correctly matched with their nodal agencies?

A. Suryamitra Skill Development Programme          -           National Institute of Solar Energy

B. Vayumitra Skill Development Programme           -    National Institute of Wind Energy

C. Jal-Urjamitra Skill Development Programme      -  Department of Hydro & Renewable Energy
options: A and B
A, B and C
B and C
A and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), 2022 UN Biodiversity Conference has been held in Montreal, Canada. Which of the following countries has chaired the COP15 of UN Biodiversity Conference?
options: India
Canada
China
Mexico
Belgium

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Environment, Forest & Climate Change has informed about the plastic recycling targets under Plastic Waste Management (PWM) Rules, 2016. As per guidelines, plastic packaging has been covered under how many categories?
options: Category I to Category V
Category I to Category IV
Category I to Category III
Category I to Category VI
Category I to Category IX

quiz.text: Government of India through the Power Tariff Policy 2016 has mandated all Thermal Power Plants to use the treated sewage water from Sewage Treatment Plants (STPs) situated within _________ radius for non-potable purposes.
options: 40 kms
100 kms
75 kms
25 kms
50 kms

quiz.text: Under National Portal for Solar Rooftop, subsidy has been fixed at _____________ (for capacity upto 3 kW) for the entire country.
options: Rs. 7,588/- per kW
Rs. 14,588/- per kW
Rs. 5,588/- per kW
Rs. 11,588/- per kW
Rs. 17,588/- per kW

quiz.text: As per the Generation Expansion Planning studies carried out by the Central Electricity Authority (CEA) for 2029-30, the share of non-fossil fuel-based generation capacity in the total installed capacity of the country is likely to increase from around 42% as on Oct, 2022 to more than ___________ by 2029-30.
options: 48%
56%
64%
52%
60%

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of State for Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution has shared information regarding the Ethanol Blended Petrol (EBP) Programme. Ethanol Interest Subvention Scheme(s) provides financial assistance in the form of interest subvention of ________ per annum.
options: 5%
6%
7%
8%
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State of Earth Sciences informed about the rising sea level and erosion. Which of the following states has the highest erosion percentage wise?
options: Maharashtra
Gujarat
Kerala
West Bengal
Odisha

quiz.text: As per 'The Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act, 2016', ___________ of the total number of vacancies to be filled up by direct recruitment, in the cadre strength, in each group of posts, i.e. Group A, B and C are reserved for disabled people.
options: 3.5%
5%
6%
4%
8%

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister for Women & Child Development has provided information about Child Adoption Resource Information & Guidance System (CARINGS) & Adoption Regulations, 2022. As per the regulations, what is the upper age limit for Prospective Adoptive Parents (PAPs) for adopting a child below 2 years age?
options: Couples: 85 years
Single Parent: 50 years
Couples: 75 years
1 and 2
2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of State for Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution has briefed about Food Security (Assistance to State Government) (Amendment) Rules, 2022. As per rules, what is the fair price shop (FPS) dealers margin for general category states?
options: Rs 90 per quintal
Rs 180 per quintal
Rs 75 per quintal
Rs 150 per quintal
None of the above

quiz.text: Annual Report of CPGRAMS for the year 2022 has been released by Department of Administrative Reforms and Public Grievances. As per the report the average disposal time of grievances has improved from 32 days in 2021 to what days in 2022?
options: 30
29
24
27
19

quiz.text: CPGRAMS portal is available in how many languages?
options: 22
18
23
12
8

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), ‘Prashasan Gaon Ki Ore’ campaign has been launched by which of the following ministries?
options: Ministry of Rural Development
Ministry of Panchayati Raj
Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances & Pensions
Ministry of Home Affairs
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), as per the 77th round of the Situation Assessment Survey (SAS) of Agricultural Households conducted by NSO under MoSPI, which of the following has become the top state in Average Monthly Income per Agricultural Household?
options: Haryana
Punjab
Sikkim
Meghalaya
Uttarakhand

quiz.text: As per recent (Dec 2022) news, which of the following countries has launched the ‘Group of Friends’ initiative at the UN Security Council?
options: France
India
Israel
USA
Japan

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Ministry of Finance has reduced the windfall tax on various crude based products. The windfall taxes are being reviewed _________
options: annually
quarterly
every six months
monthly
every fortnight

quiz.text: As per recent (Dec 2022) news, additional 50,000 Amrit Sarovar ponds will be constructed by 15th August 2023. Every Amrit Sarovar will have a pondage area of ________ with a water holding capacity of about 10,000 cubic metre.
options: 5 acre
1 acre
8 acre
10 acre
7 acre

quiz.text: Special Police Unit for North East Region (SPUNER) has been setup by which of the following entities?
options: Ministry of Development of North Eastern Region
Delhi Police
Assam Rifles
Ministry of Defence
Government of Assam

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), BHOOMI RAKSHA (Encroachment Removal Module) has been inaugurated. It has been developed by which of the following entities?
options: Directorate General Defence Estates
National Informatics Centre
ISRO
Ministry of Home Affairs
2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of Railways has shared information regarding the Dedicated Freight Corridor in the Lok Sabha. The Western Dedicated Freight Corridor having a length of 1506 km runs from ___________ to Jawaharlal Nehru Port Trust, Maharashtra.
options: Ludhiana, Punjab
Sonnagar, West Bengal
Sonipat, Haryana
Dadri, UP
Mandi, Himachal Pradesh

quiz.text: HSN code which stands for “Harmonized System of Nomenclature”, is a ________ uniform code.
options: 8-digit uniform code
12-digit uniform code
6-digit uniform code
14-digit uniform code
None of the above

quiz.text: As per National Steel Policy 2017, what is India’s target for steel production by 2030?
options: 300 MT
200 MT
250 MT
500 MT
1000 MT

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) has shared information regarding Khadi Reforms and Development Programme in Lok Sabha. The programme has been initiated in which of the following years?
options: 2015
2009
2004
2019
2012

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Electronics and Information Technology, has shared National Association of Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM) data on exports from Indian Information Technology/ Business Process Management (IT/ BPM) sector. What is the export value in the financial year 2021-2022?
options: USD 149 billion
USD 152 billion
USD 178 billion
USD 212 billion
USD 197 billion

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), logo, website, and social media handles of Urban-20 event has been unveiled. U20 meeting has been organized at which of the following locations?
options: Ahmedabad
Mumbai
Hyderabad
Indore
Chennai

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of Commerce and Industry has participated in the Ministerial Meeting on Economic Benefits for the Indo-Pacific Economic Framework for Prosperity (IPEF). India has agreed to which of the following pillars of IPEF?

A.     Trade

B.      Supply Chain

C.      Clean Energy, Decarbonization, and Infrastructure

D.     Tax and Anti-Corruption
options: B and C
A, B and C
B, C and D
A and C
A, B, C and D

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister for Finance has chaired the 48th Meeting of the GST (Goods and Services Tax) Council. GST Council has been constituted as per the ____________ article of amended constitution (101st Amendment).
options: 224
179
218
314
279

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State in the Ministry of Defence has briefed about the Border Area Development Programme (BADP). The programme is being implemented in habitations located within ___________ from the first habitation at international border.
options: 0-15 kms
0-10 kms
0-5 kms
0-20 kms
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to North Eastern Council?
options: NEC was setup in 1971.
It is under the administrative purview of Ministry of Development of the North-Eastern Region.
The North Eastern Council is the nodal agency for the economic and social development of the North Eastern Region which consists of the seven states.
The policy deliberations at the NEC are conducted at the Plenary meetings of the Council.
None of the above
